name: ValidatedResource

commentData.description:
ValidatedResource is a Resource that can validate that property
changes (or the whole instance) do not violate the structure of
the type information associated with the instance.

methods.name: setPropertyValue

commentData.description: Sets a property, validating that it does not violate the model

tags.title: throws
tags.description: if the value is not compatible with the model definition for the field

description: Sets a property, validating that it does not violate the model

methods.name: addArrayValue

commentData.description: Adds an array property value, validating that it does not violate the model

tags.title: throws
tags.description: if the value is not compatible with the model definition for the field

description: Adds an array property value, validating that it does not violate the model

methods.name: validate

commentData.description: Validates the instance against its model.

tags.title: throws
tags.description: if the instance if invalid with respect to the model

description: Validates the instance against its model.
ValidatedResource is a Resource that can validate that property
changes (or the whole instance) do not violate the structure of
